ygData.subject: Re: The Mafia chase...
ygData.msgSnippet: Deemos loses track of Clash. Deemos: I lost him. Shokaract: Figures, you are incompetent. Deemos: He had the spark signatures of my targets, my future victims,

Deemos loses track of Clash.

Deemos: I lost him.

Shokaract: Figures, you are incompetent.

Deemos: He had the spark signatures of my targets, my future victims, the
ones I must kill, what was he doing with them?

Shokaract: Can we go now?

Deemos: No.

Shokaract: Huh?

Deemos: look, it's Technosis. Leave this one to me, there is only one guy
that looks formidable, the others are Technosis, an old man and a kid!

Deemos was looking at Technosis, Aerotaur, Gramps, and Zeni.

Deemos: Ha! This will be too easy.

Deemos stepped around the corner.

Deemos: Stay there until I need you.

Deemos told the Mafia that.

Shokaract: Why not, I'll watch him kill himself.

Deemos: Hey there, sport! Gramps, fellow, and you...Land Mine.

Technosis raises her blaster, but it breaks apart and clatters to the
ground, water pouring from it from when she was hiding in the water from
Clash.

Deemos: I am not a bad person, this femme needs to come home with me, I was
lonely looking for her, my darling wife.

Technosis: That thought sickens me, no way I'd marry you, even if you are
the last bot in the universe! I am a widow!

Deemos: I never knew you got married, Land Mine.

Technosis: Sure I did, to Psuedo.

Deemos remembers Psuedo's energy signature on that flying bot. Someone had
beat him to Psuedo!

Deemos: No matter, I will destroy you once and for all. But first I might
torture your friends...
